Description: Lead DM completes familiarization with the protocol of a clinical trial: trial type (open, blind), randomization type, procedures performed to patients.

Lead DM creates a project working group (chat in Microsoft Teams) for prompt and efficient communication of the Project Teams (PM, Lead Monitor, Medical Expert, Lead Medical Monitor, Lead SAS-analyst).
Biostatistician creates test randomization list.
Lead DM integrates test rand list into DB.
Lead DM prepares technical specification on study database creation and key initial technical database settings.
Lead DM sends TS for approval to Project Manager, Medical Expert and Head of DM Department.
Lead DM creates study database according to TS on study db creation.
Lead DM creates in DB visit schedule according to the Study Protocol.
Lead DM creates in DB test sites and subjects (patients).
Lead DM creates in DB electronic Case Report Forms according to the procedures specified in the Study Protocol, and attached them to the relevant visit.
Logistics specialist creates test Investigational Product and sends it to test sites in order to test randomization/inclusion process in DB.
Lead DM programs edits checks and automated notifications upon data entry.
Lead DM creates report template(s) in Jaspersoft Studio and set them up in the DB as needed.
Lead DM develops DB specification.

Assignee: PM, ME, SAS-analyst, Head of DM
Description: Lead DM sends DB specification for approval to Project Manager, Medical Expert, SAS-analyst and Head of DM Department.

Lead DM grants access to the test DB to the Project Team for initial DB testing to confirm that DB and eCRF content corresponds with the Protocol (PM and his/her team of monitors, SAS, Medical Expert, Lead Medical Monitor).
Lead DM handles the reports on initial testing by the Project Team and if necessary implements corrections and adjustments to the DB to fix errors or inconsistencies.

Assignee: PM, ME, MM, SAS-analyst, Lead DM
Description: Conduct retesting rounds until all comments from the project team are fully addressed.
Assistant DM validates whether the DB meets its technical requirements.
Lead DM handles the UAT report and if necessary implements corrections and adjustments to the DB to fix errors or inconsistencies.
Conduct retesting rounds until all comments from the Assistant DM are fully addressed.
Lead DM develops Data Validation Plan (DVP).
Lead DM sends DVP for approval to SAS-analyst and Medical Monitor.
Lead DM develops a specification of the edit checks programmed in the DB.
Lead DM sends the edit check specification for approval to SAS-analyst and Medical Monitor.
Lead DM develops the eCRF Completion Guidelines of the DB.
Lead DM sends the eCRF Completion Guidelines for approval to PM and Medical Monitor.
Lead DM develops a specification of the automated notifications programmed in the DB.
Lead DM sends the notification specification for approval to PM and Head of DM.
Lead DM develops the eCRF Content based on the approved DB specification. and shares it to the PM and his/her team of monitors
Lead DM prepares and sends for approval (PM, Medical Expert, Lead Medical Monitor, Lead SAS-analyst, Head of DM) TS on migration the DB from the testing environment to production.
Lead DM migrates the DB to the production environment and informs the Project Team on that
Lead DM creates in the production DB sites that participate in the study (provided by the PM).
Lead DM receives laboratory reference ranges of each site (provided by the PM) and integrates them in the DB Laboratory Norms Module.
Assistant Data Manager checks that the lab values are consistent in the DB and provided documentation.
Biostatistician creates randomization list.
Lead DM integrates randomization list into DB.
Logistics specialist creates Investigational Product and sends it to sites for randomization/inclusion in DB.
Lead DM conducts training sessions for the Project Team.
Lead DM conducts training sessions for the Research Team (Investigational sites).
Lead DM creates user credentials and grants access to the DB to the study participant (Project Team and Research Team, the last one provided by the PM).
